xxl.core.io.fat.util
Class ByteArrayConversionsLittleEndian

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.fat.util.ByteArrayConversionsLittleEndian

public class ByteArrayConversionsLittleEndian
extends Object

Conversion routines byte-Array --> short, int, long. Little endian byte ordering is assumed: 00 01 00 00 = 1, 00 00 00 01 = 65536, 00 00 80 00 = -2147483648
